mapper.sql: select id, order_code, order_type, order_from, order_class, product_material_code, product_material_desc, customer_code, customer_desc, product_factory_code, product_factory_desc, mrp_range, bom_version, purchase_group_code, order_num, unit, delivery_date, product_date, place, audit_status, status, data_source, del_flag, remark, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by from oms_real_order
mapper.select: SELECT order_from, product_material_code, product_material_desc, product_factory_code, customer_code, customer_desc, delivery_date, product_date, sum(IFNULL(order_num, 0)) as order_num from oms_real_order group by order_from, product_factory_code,product_material_code,customer_code,product_date,product_material_desc,customer_desc
mapper.insert:
insert into oms_real_order ( order_code, order_type, order_from, order_class, product_material_code, product_material_desc, customer_code, customer_desc, product_factory_code, product_factory_desc, mrp_range, bom_version, purchase_group_code, order_num, unit, delivery_date, product_date, place, status, audit_status, data_source, del_flag, remark, create_time, create_by )values
( #{item.orderCode}, ifnull(#{item.orderType}, ''), #{item.orderFrom}, #{item.orderClass}, #{item.productMaterialCode}, ifnull(#{item.productMaterialDesc}, ''), #{item.customerCode}, ifnull(#{item.customerDesc}, ''), #{item.productFactoryCode}, ifnull(#{item.productFactoryDesc}, ''), #{item.mrpRange}, #{item.bomVersion}, ifnull(#{item.purchaseGroupCode}, ''), #{item.orderNum}, ifnull(#{item.unit}, ''), #{item.deliveryDate}, ifnull(#{item.productDate}, ''), #{item.place}, ifnull(#{item.status}, 0), ifnull(#{item.auditStatus}, 0), #{item.dataSource}, 0, ifnull(#{item.remark}, ''), now(), ifnull(#{item.createBy}, '') )
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE order_from = VALUES(order_from), order_class = VALUES(order_class), product_material_desc = VALUES(product_material_desc), mrp_range = VALUES(mrp_range), bom_version = VALUES(bom_version), order_num = VALUES(order_num), unit = VALUES(unit), product_date = VALUES(product_date), place = VALUES(place), data_source = VALUES(data_source), remark = VALUES(remark), create_by = VALUES(create_by), update_time = now()
